statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'xremit_pro_v2' and table_name = 'script' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
select * from `payment_gateways` where (`type` = 'MANUAL') and `slug` = 'remittance-gateway' and `id` = 6 limit 1
select * from `payment_gateway_currencies` where `payment_gateway_currencies`.`payment_gateway_id` in (6) order by `id` desc
select * from `user_kyc_data` where `user_kyc_data`.`user_id` = 3 and `user_kyc_data`.`user_id` is not null limit 1
select column_name as `column_name` from information_schema.columns where table_schema = 'xremit_pro_v2' and table_name = 'user_notifications'

insert into `user_notifications` (`user_id`, `message`, `updated_at`, `created_at`) values (3, '\"Your Remittance  (Payable amount: 12.40,\r\n                    Get Amount: 7,648.30) Successfully Sended.\"', '2023-10-21 05:45:43', '2023-10-21 05:45:43')
bindings: "Your Remittance  (Payable amount: 12.40,\r\n                    Get Amount: 7,648.30) Successfully Sended."

statements.sql: insert into `transactions` (`user_id`, `payment_gateway_currency_id`, `type`, `remittance_data`, `trx_id`, `request_amount`, `exchange_rate`, `payable`, `fees`, `convert_amount`, `will_get_amount`, `remark`, `details`, `status`, `attribute`, `created_at`) values (3, 30, 'Remittance Gateway', '{\"type\":\"Bank Transfer\",\"sender_name\":\"Sean Underwood\",\"sender_email\":\"user3@appdevs.net\",\"sender_currency\":\"USD\",\"receiver_currency\":\"NGN\",\"sender_ex_rate\":\"1.00\",\"sender_base_rate\":\"1.00\",\"receiver_ex_rate\":\"764.83\",\"first_name\":\"Wyatt\",\"middle_name\":\"Zorita Mcfadden\",\"last_name\":\"Adkins\",\"email\":\"gehedyh@mailinator.com\",\"country\":\"Nigeria\",\"city\":\"Distinctio Quia eiu\",\"state\":\"Culpa consequatur U\",\"address\":\"Omnis amet eligendi\",\"zip_code\":\"92998\",\"phone\":\"29\",\"method_name\":\"First Bank of Nigeria Limited\",\"account_number\":\"ABC230\",\"document_type\":\"\",\"sending_purpose\":\"Father\",\"source\":\"Business\",\"currency\":{\"name\":\"ADPay USD\",\"code\":\"USD\"},\"send_money\":\"10\",\"convert_amount\":\"10.00\",\"remark\":\"Ad in nemo quos even\"}', 'R87713699', '10', '1.0000000000000000', 11.2, '1.20', '10.00', '7648.30', 'ADPay', 'COMPLETED', 1, 'SEND', '2023-10-21 05:45:43')

To initiate a payment using our manual payment gateway, please follow the instructions provided below. We offer two convenient methods for you to choose from:

Bank Transfer

  1. Visit your local bank or access your online banking platform.
  2. Initiate a new fund transfer or payment.
  3. Enter the recipient’s bank account details: 
  4.  Bank Name: HSBC
  5. IBAN (International Bank Account Number) : 01234567890
  6. Specify the payment amount in the currency you intend to use.
  7. Double-check all details, including the recipient’s account information.
  8. Confirm and authorize the transfer.
  9. Retain the payment receipt or confirmation for future reference.

Please ensure that you keep a record of your payment as proof of the transaction. In case of any discrepancies or verification requirements, you may be asked to provide this documentation. Your payment will be manually verified by our team, and once confirmed, your order will be processed promptly. We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to serving you!

We offer two convenient methods for you to choose from:</span></p><p><strong>Bank Transfer</strong></p><ol><li>Visit your local bank or access your online banking platform.</li><li>Initiate a new fund transfer or payment.</li><li>Enter the recipient’s bank account details: </li><li> Bank Name: HSBC</li><li>IBAN (International Bank Account Number) : 01234567890</li><li>Specify the payment amount in the currency you intend to use.</li><li>Double-check all details, including the recipient’s account information.</li><li>Confirm and authorize the transfer.</li><li>Retain the payment receipt or confirmation for future reference.</li></ol><p>Please ensure that you keep a record of your payment as proof of the transaction. In case of any discrepancies or verification requirements, you may be asked to provide this documentation. Your payment will be manually verified by our team, and once confirmed, your order will be processed promptly. We appreciate your cooperation and look forward to serving you!</p>"
